data.eml:eml: Hyperparasitoid wasps (Hymenoptera, Trigonalidae) reared from dry forest and rain forest caterpillars of Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, Costa Rica

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, David R., Janzen, Daniel H., Hallwachs, Winnie, Smith, M. Alexander (2012): Hyperparasitoid wasps (Hymenoptera, Trigonalidae) reared from dry forest and rain forest caterpillars of Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, Costa Rica. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 29: 119-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.29.3233, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.29.3233
